text: @Mike_Pence Difficult to believe you’re sincere about concern for human life when you don’t evidence any concern for lives once they’re outside the womb. Kurdish allies, mass shooting victims, survivors of sexual assault and natural disasters, COVID-19 victims, immigrants fleeing violence...
